For me, going to Eve is difficult. But that's mainly because whenever I create a Maneuver to go there, the closest approach nodes randomly disappear.

 

It's really frustrating. Why doesn't it always show the nodes?

Because sometimes the range to capture is smaller than you can drag so it misses. You can use the precise adjustments at the lower left to fine tune, sliding the vertical one down to lower the increment amount.
